title: League of legends OCE is anyone else having issues ??
body:
[System Notification] Your match will start soon. Please wait as we load up your game. This process should not take more than a few minutes.

our whole team has been sitting here for 5 minutes....

replies.body:
There seems to be some connection drama in general.

I'm getting the ol' "skip waiting for stats" which I haven't seen in ages and some web-based client assets are real slow to load.

I don't think it's just League. There was a big (but shortlived) DDoS on a lot of services on the 1st, possible it's happening again.
